headline: Yahoo Finance partnering with Coinbase to expand crypto coverage
summary: Yahoo Finance is partnering with cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase Global (COIN) in a move to expand coverage of the crypto market. Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi comes on The Morning Brief about what this partnership will entail and outlines the new features and tools that Yahoo Finance users can take advantage of. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
